events.name: Moon Landing
events.info: Apollo 11 was the American spaceflight that first landed humans on the Moon. Commander Neil Armstrong and lunar module pilot Buzz Aldrin landed the Apollo Lunar Module Eagle.

events.name: First iPhone
events.info: The original iPhone was released by Apple Inc. on June 29, 2007. It combined a mobile phone, widescreen iPod, and Internet device into one product.

periods.name: World War II
periods.info: World War II was a global conflict that lasted from 1939 to 1945. It involved most of the world's nations and resulted in an estimated 70-85 million fatalities.

periods.name: Cold War
periods.info: The Cold War was a period of geopolitical tension between the United States and the Soviet Union and their respective allies, lasting from 1947 until the dissolution of the Soviet Union in 1991.
